extendedInfo.description: Best Android: Despicable Mr Candy! Great photo and game of Despicable Mr Candy!.This game is so easy but super fun!There are 3 Games!Game 1-Memory Game.  Unfold the block to match similar picture, trains your memory.Game 2-Puzzle Game.  Swift each block to form the whole picture.Game 3-Block Game.  Change the block to fit each other.Once you have completed each levels, you will be addicted to it.Tip on Scoring:---------------The more block you clear, the higher the score!Other features:---------------You can pause the game and resume later.We have put the best collection of video of funny candies (You never know candies can be that funny!!)

reviews.title: you\'d be a fool if you dont download
